subtitleNullable: Data set of pre-owned car for re-sale in India-2021
descriptionNullable: ### Context Used cars are sold through a variety of outlets, including franchise and independent car dealers. The re-sale price of used car is fundamentally influenced by the market usability of the pertinent brand, car's generic conditions & maneuvering facilities of the car. The data set is from one of the leading e-commerce platform for pre-owned automobiles re-sale in India. Source code used for web scraping this data is [released here](https://www.kaggle.com/darshandhanke/exploratory-data-analysis-car-re-sale-in-india). ### Content The data set includes several car models put up for re-sales in some of the most popular cities of India such as Mumbai, New Delhi, Bengaluru and more. The data set includes brief data on the car models including the maker brand, manufactured year, previous number of owner, distance covered, fuel type , etc. ### Acknowledgements This dataset was collected from web-scraping the [www.cars24.com](https://www.cars24.com/buy-used-car?) URL. ### Inspiration Possible uses for the dataset could include: * Train ML algorithms for Price Prediction of car model. * Determination of car model life span & valuation over time. Open for more suggestions. ### Credits Photo by Ruffa Jane Reyes on Unsplash
title: Car Resale in India
subtitle: Data set of pre-owned car for re-sale in India-2021
description: ### Context Used cars are sold through a variety of outlets, including franchise and independent car dealers. The re-sale price of used car is fundamentally influenced by the market usability of the pertinent brand, car's generic conditions & maneuvering facilities of the car. The data set is from one of the leading e-commerce platform for pre-owned automobiles re-sale in India. Source code used for web scraping this data is [released here](https://www.kaggle.com/darshandhanke/exploratory-data-analysis-car-re-sale-in-india). ### Content The data set includes several car models put up for re-sales in some of the most popular cities of India such as Mumbai, New Delhi, Bengaluru and more. The data set includes brief data on the car models including the maker brand, manufactured year, previous number of owner, distance covered, fuel type , etc. ### Acknowledgements This dataset was collected from web-scraping the [www.cars24.com](https://www.cars24.com/buy-used-car?) URL. ### Inspiration Possible uses for the dataset could include: * Train ML algorithms for Price Prediction of car model. * Determination of car model life span & valuation over time. Open for more suggestions. ### Credits Photo by Ruffa Jane Reyes on Unsplash
